p: All solvents used for CPC, TLC and GC-MS analysis were of analytical grade. n-Heptane (n-Hept), Acetonitrile (CH 3CN), Butanol (BuOH), were purchased from Carlo Erba Reactifs SDS (Val de Reuil, France) while c-Hexane (c-Hex) and CH 2CL 2 (DCM) from Fisher Scientific UK (Leicestershire, UK). Sulphuric Acid (H 2SO 4) and Vanillin standard (98%) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Steinheim, Germany).
